```{r}
n <- 200
loc <- matrix(c(runif(n, 0, 1), runif(n, 0, 1)), ncol = 2)

colnames(loc) <- c("x", "y") 

sf <- st_as_sf(
  as.data.frame(loc),  
  coords = c("x", "y"),  
  crs = 4326  
)

dist(loc)

st_coordinates(sf[1,])  # extract data

class(sf)  # "sf", "data.frame"
if (!'sf' %in% class(sf)) stop("sf is not a spatial data frame.")

sf[200,]
st_centroid(sf)  # returns centroids
```
